page.title: 07 Saltshouse School Ecology
page.content: We decided to do the{ecology}side of the DOMESDAY project. In our school grounds we have 234{trees.}Among these there are; Almond, Ash, Cyprus, Elm, Mulberry, Silver Birch, Sycamore, Weeping Willow and Willow. There were also many Hawthorn{trees,}in fact there were 163. Elder came second with 29 and Sycamore third with 10. We decided there were more Hawthorn because they spread more easily. A bird eats a berry, flies off and leaves the{seed}in its droppings. The seed grows and the cycle is repeated. Around the front of the school are more decorative species put there for show. Examples of these are; Almond, Ash, Elm and Silver Birch. We took the Ph value of the{soil} around our DOMESDAY area, we found the majority of it was close to neutral.
